com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

Class OuterArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.BaseNativeObject
      • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.SpatialObject
        • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.Area
          • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.OuterArea

  • public final class OuterArea
extends Area
    This class represents the physical outer area of a Level associated with a Venue (building).

    A level may have several outer areas for, depending on the physical appearance of the building. This class can be used to get Space objects associated with it.

    OuterArea cannot be instantiated directly. Instead, it can be obtained by calling Level.getOuterAreas().

    See Also:
    Venue, Level, Level.getSortedSpaces(), Level.getSortedSpacesByCategory(String), Level.getSortedSpacesWithFacilities(), Space, VenueController
